metadata.title: CVE-2016-2476 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-06-01 does not validate OMX buffer sizes, whichallows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, asdemonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access, akainternal bug 27207275.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
